attributes.action: Update the annuity awarded to Victoria Cross & George Cross recipients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On its inception in 1856 Victoria Cross recipients were granted a pension of £10 per annum. 
This was updated to £50 per annum in 1898; approximately the average pay for a factory worker.
Today, the average wage criteria should be taken as the minimum starting point for consideration, then be index linked to reflect the cost of living.
The pension should also be awarded to next-of-kin in the case posthumous awards.
